body_html:
Thanks @guoyejun !
@keryell that is an excelent point! In the near future we will be adding something simillar for half ( as it requires an OpenCL extension and might be not supported on all OpenCL platforms ). Indeed https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources seems like good place for that.

@benoitsteiner / @gunan / @drpngx what do you think? Is this approach acceptable?
